Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Sheridan/Rogers
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable LS Exp. buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Rogers, Howard Terminal; SB: Howard, Rogers, Sheridan; due to street blockage near Sheridan/Rogers.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Sheridan/Rogers, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Rogers & Howard Terminal.

Southbound buses will operate via Howard, Rogers & Sheridan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Illinois Medical District.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems near Illinois Medical District.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Leavitt
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted EB: Jackson, Western, Madison, Damen & Jackson; WB: Van Buren, Damen, Madison, Western & Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Jackson/Leavitt.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Western, Madison, Damen and Jackson.

Westbound buses will operate via  Van Buren, Damen, Madison, Western and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.
